import { useState } from "react" import "./works.scss" export default function Works() { const [currentSlide, setCurrentSlide] = useState(0); const data = [ { id: "1", icon: "./assets/mobile-phone-icon-png-2.png", title: "Weather App", desc: "Check the weather anywhere, with the react weather app", img: "./assets/React weather pic 2.png", }, { id: "2", icon: "./assets/mobile-phone-icon-png-2.png", title: "Ecommerce", desc: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit.", img:"./assets/portfolio test img.jpeg" }, { id: "3", icon: "./assets/mobile-phone-icon-png-2.png", title: "Piano", desc: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit.", img:"./assets/portfolio test img.jpeg" }, ]; const handleClick = (way)=>{ way === "left" ? setCurrentSlide(currentSlide > 0 ? currentSlide-1 : 2) : setCurrentSlide(currentSlide
{data.map((d) => (

{d.title}

{d.desc}

Projects
))}
handleClick("left")}/> handleClick("right")}/> ) }
